biotools.summary: "REcombination Counting and ORDering" can be used for the ordering of loci on genetic linkage maps. The method minimises the total number of recombination events. The search algorithm is a heuristic procedure, combining elements of branch-and-bound with local reshuffling.

bioschemas.name: Record
